p: When comparing pre-operative with post-operative samples in the No-LCOS group, there was up-regulation of metabolic pathway associated genes such as UQRC1 (1.75 fold), COX8A (1.21 fold), and CYC1 (1.21 fold). In contrast, comparison of post-operative samples over pre-operative samples in patients who developed LCOS revealed down regulation of metabolic pathway associated genes like UQRC1 (0.63 fold), COX8A (0.49 fold), CYC1 (0.22 fold). Furthermore, in patients that developed LCOS there was an increase in STAT5B (2.11 fold) an inflammatory signaling associate gene (Fig.Â 5).
